title: Mining/Level up table
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mining/Level up table
LevelNew abilities
Each level
  • Consuming Evil Dave's spicy stew can boost a minimum of -5 and maximum of +5 to Mining
  • Drinking a dwarven stout will boost your Mining level by 1
  • Drinking a dwarven stout(m) will boost your Mining level by 2
  • Using the special attack on a 3rd age pickaxe/dragon pickaxe/infernal pickaxe/crystal pickaxe will boost your Mining level by 3
1
  • Mine clay
  • Mine copper ore
  • Mine rune essence (with Rune Mysteries completed)
  • Mine tin ore
  • Use bronze pickaxes
  • Use iron pickaxes
2No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
3No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
4No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
5
  • Required to complete Easy Desert Diary
6
  • Use steel pickaxes
7No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
8No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
9No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
10
  • Mine blurite ore
  • Mine stardust from size-1 crashed stars
  • Required for The Knight's Sword
  • Mine limestone
  • Required to complete Easy Falador Diary
11
  • Use black pickaxes
12No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
13No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
14
  • Mine barronite shards and barronite deposits (with Below Ice Mountain completed)
15
  • Mine iron ore
  • Required for In Aid of the Myreque
  • Required to complete Easy Kourend & Kebos Diary
  • Required to complete Easy Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
  • Required to complete Easy Varrock Diary
  • Required to complete Easy Western Provinces Diary
  • Required to complete Easy Wilderness Diary
16No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
17
  • Required for The Lost Tribe
18No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
19No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
20
  • Mine silver ore
  • Mine stardust from size-2 crashed stars
  • Mine daeyalt ore (with partial completion of Darkness of Hallowvale)
  • Mine elemental ore (with partial completion of Elemental Workshop I)
  • Required for Darkness of Hallowvale
  • Required for Elemental Workshop I
  • Required for Tears of Guthix
  • Required to complete Easy Fremennik Diary
21
  • Use mithril pickaxes
22
  • Mine volcanic ash (with Bone Voyage completed)
23No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
24No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
25No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
26No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
27No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
28No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
29No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
30
  • Mine coal
  • Mine stardust from size-3 crashed stars
  • Access to the lower level of the Motherlode Mine
  • Mine pay-dirt
  • Mine pure essence (with Rune Mysteries completed)
  • Required to complete Medium Kandarin Diary
31
  • Use adamant pickaxes
32No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
33No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
34No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
35
  • Mine sandstone
36No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
37
  • Required for Spirits of the Elid
38
  • Mine dense essence blocks (with 38 )
  • Required to complete Elite Kourend & Kebos Diary
39No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
40
  • Mine gold ore
  • Mine stardust from size-4 crashed stars
  • Mine gem rocks (with Shilo Village completed)
  • Required for Between a Rock...
  • Required for Family Crest
  • Required for Watchtower
  • Required to complete Easy Karamja Diary
  • Required to complete Medium Falador Diary
  • Required to complete Medium Fremennik Diary
  • Required to complete Medium Karamja Diary
  • Required to complete Medium Western Provinces Diary
41
  • Use rune pickaxes
42
  • Mine volcanic sulphur
  • Required to complete Medium Kourend & Kebos Diary
43
  • Access to the Blast mine and mine blasted ore (with 100% Lovakengj favour)
44No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
45
  • Mine granite
  • Possibility of obtaining mithril ore from blasted ore
  • Required to complete Hard Desert Diary
46No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
47No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
48No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
49No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
50
  • Mine stardust from size-5 crashed stars
  • Access to the Volcanic Mine and mine iron ore fragments, silver ore fragments, coal fragments, and gold ore fragments from the boulder inside (with 150 kudos and Bone Voyage completed)
  • Required for Heroes' Quest
51No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
52
  • Required for Legends' Quest
  • Required to complete Hard Karamja Diary
53No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
54No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
55
  • Mine mithril ore
  • Possibility of obtaining mithril ore from pay-dirt
  • Mine mithril ore fragments from the boulder in the Volcanic Mine (with 150 kudos and Bone Voyage completed)
  • Required to complete Hard Morytania Diary
  • Required to complete Medium Wilderness Diary
56No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
57No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
58No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
59No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
60
  • Access to the free-to-play section of the Mining Guild
  • Mine stardust from size-6 crashed stars
  • Access to the member section of the Mining Guild
  • Mine lunar ore (with partial completion of Lunar Diplomacy)
  • Mine Daeyalt shards (with completion of Sins of the Father)
  • Possibility of obtaining adamantite ore from blasted ore
  • Required for Lunar Diplomacy
  • Required to complete Hard Falador Diary
61
  • Use 3rd age pickaxes
  • Use dragon pickaxes
  • Use infernal pickaxes (with 85 )
62No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
63No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
64No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
65
  • Mine lovakite ore (with 30% Lovakengj favour)
  • Required to complete Hard Kourend & Kebos Diary
66No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
67No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
68
  • Required for Dragon Slayer II
69No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
70
  • Mine adamantite ore
  • Mine stardust from size-7 crashed stars
  • Wear expert mining gloves
  • Possibility of obtaining adamantite ore from pay-dirt
  • Mine adamantite ore fragments from the boulder in the Volcanic Mine (with 150 kudos and Bone Voyage completed)
  • Required for Song of the Elves
  • Required to complete Hard Fremennik Diary
  • Required to complete Hard Western Provinces Diary
71
  • Use crystal pickaxes (with Song of the Elves completed)
72
  • Access to the upper level of the Motherlode Mine (after paying a one time fee of 100 golden nuggets to Prospector Percy)
  • Mine basalt (with Making Friends with My Arm completed)
  • Mine efh salt (with Making Friends with My Arm completed)
  • Mine te salt (with Making Friends with My Arm completed)
  • Mine urt salt (with Making Friends with My Arm completed)
  • Required for Making Friends with My Arm
73No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
74No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
75
  • Possibility of obtaining runite ore from blasted ore
76No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
77No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
78No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
79No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
80
  • Mine stardust from size-8 crashed stars
81No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
82No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
83No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
84No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
85
  • Mine runite ore
  • Possibility of obtaining runite ore from pay-dirt
  • Mine runite ore fragments from the boulder in the Volcanic Mine (with 150 kudos and Bone Voyage completed)
  • Required to complete Elite Wilderness Diary
86No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
87No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
88No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
89No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
90
  • Mine stardust from size-9 crashed stars
91No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
92
  • Mine amethyst
93No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
94No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
95No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
96No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
97No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
98No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
99
  • Skill mastery
  • Buy the mining cape and hood from Gadrin near the Mining Guild entrance south of the east bank in Falador, and wear them
v • d • e
Level up tables
Free-to-play
Combat
  • Attack
  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Prayer
  • Magic
  • Hitpoints
Other
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Firemaking
  • Fishing
  • Mining
  • Runecraft
  • Smithing
  • Woodcutting
Member
  • Agility
  • Construction
  • Farming
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Hunter
  • Slayer
  • Thieving
